description:
The second-year high school student http://anidb.net/ch43396 [Kanda Sorata] lives in Sakurasou, the dormitory for problem children at Sorata`s school. One day, http://anidb.net/ch43395 [Shiina Mashiro] — a cute girl who happens to be also a cosmopolitan, brilliant artist — moves into Sakurasou.
Sorata knowing the weirdos at the dormitory feels he should protect Mashiro. Surprisingly she seems to need more help than expected: she has no idea how to take care of herself, i.e. often gets lost, and her room is a complete mess. Sorata`s dorm mates designate him as the master of Mashiro, and thus, an ordinary boy and a brilliant girl live like a master and his pet.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
Sorata is a normal student living in an abnormal dorm and has one goal: ESCAPE!   
But those plans are thrown when a new student moves in.
Source: crunchyroll

Sorata is tasked with watching over Shiina Mashiro, her naivety is slowing corrupting his life.
Source: crunchyroll

Sorata’s determination to move out of Sakura Hall is being questioned by his dorm mates. As he tries to distance himself from Shiina, rumor of her visiting a love hotel causes him to rush to her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: So Close and Yet So Far...

REGULAR.description:
Big changes are happening at the Hall when Sorata finally makes his decision.  Will the other residents admit their true feelings, too?
Source: crunchyroll

A new girl is moving into Sakura Hall and things are going to get even more awkward.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Serious Girl of Sakura Hall
さくら荘のまじめな彼女

REGULAR.description:
Nanami has overworked herself with taking care of Shiina, her jobs, and voice acting school.  Her midterm 
presentation is coming up and she is in no shape to take it.  Can Sorata do anything to help her?
Source: crunchyroll

If Mashiro and Nanami wasn’t enough, Sorata has to deal with someone who has known him all his life.  The jealous between these three rivals will bring Sorata to his knees.
Source: crunchyroll

Sorata has based the first round of the game competition! His time is now devoted to mastering his oral presentation and dealing with Mashiro new found interest in discovering what love is.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: どでかい花火をあげてみろ

REGULAR.description:
One night, Mashiro`s English school friend, Rita, turns up on the doorstep to flip everyone`s world upside-down. Meanwhile, the gang finally meets the elusive occupant of Room 102: Akasaka Ryunosuke!
Source: crunchyroll

Work on Nyapollon is starting to back up; the idea is to bring in an additional artist.  But the only one who can match Mashiro’s work is Rita…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: キライキライ, ダイスキ

REGULAR.description:
Even though the festival has started, a last minute change by Sorata has everyone in Sakura Hall rushing to implement his changes.
Source: crunchyroll

The production of Milky Way Cat, Nyapollon is going well until the audience is asked to “Shout your love”.  Who will be the first to speak up?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Power of Love in the Cultural Festival

REGULAR.description:
The residents of Sakura house continue to enjoy the fame of their successful show, but as it begin to fade as Christmas approaches and the idea, the thought, and the want for love begins to take over.
Source: crunchyroll

Christmas Eve is the will be the night when truths are aired among the residents. But more than one person will have their heart broken.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eve no Madobe to Sorezore no Akari
The Windows and Lights of Christmas Eve
イヴの窓辺とそれぞれの灯り

REGULAR.description:
Sorata gets roped into taking the women of Sakura Hall to his home, where he must contend against his manly father and bro-con sister.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Itsumo no Jibun wa Doko ni Iru?
いつもの自分はどこにいる?

REGULAR.description:
The results of Sorata hard work and prep will finally show when he submits his pitch.  At the same time, Nanami is prepping for her next chance.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ずっと, 好きでした......

REGULAR.description:
Mashiro has asked Sorata to meet her on the roof, his mind races considering today is Valentine’s Day.  But a frantic call from Nanami throws everything out the window.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Valentine wa Choco no Hi yo
バレンタインはチョコの日よ

REGULAR.description:
Time is running out for Jin and Misaki; their friends rush to bring them together, but the past makes an invisible barrier.
Source: crunchyroll

The shock of Sakura Hall closing has Sorata remembering his first days of moving into the hall and the cats his picked up along the way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: There`s No Place Like Sakura Hall

REGULAR.description:
The residents start a campaign to save Sakura Hall but one resident is the lone holdout.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: In Order to Keep Saying We`re Home
Kono Saki mo Tadaima o Iu Tame ni
この先もただいまを言うために

REGULAR.description:
Sometimes you have to let go of a dream and face reality.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dare no Sei de mo Naku Ame wa Furu
It`s Not Anyone`s Fault That It Rains
誰のせいでもなく雨は降る

REGULAR.description:
Mahiro knows she is the reason for Sakura hall closing, as she prepares to leave school to protect those she loves. The residents search desperately to find her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: きらめく日々を駆け抜けろ

REGULAR.description:
Fight to the very end!
Source: crunchyroll

A new school year is starting with new and old faces.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dengeki 20-nensai "20-nen Da yo! Otona no Kaidan Nobocchau yo!? Sakura-sou Kaigi" Event Eizou
電撃20年祭「20年だよ! 大人の階段のぼっちゃうよ!? さくら荘会議」イベント映像
そして冬がやってくる
Housou Kokuchi Eizou: Sorata & Mashiro Ver.
放送告知映像 空太&ましろver.

WIKIPEDIA_JP: さくら荘のペットな彼女

2778.name: slow when it comes to love

titles.title: ซากุระโซว หอพักสร้างฝัน
さくら荘のペットな彼女
